channel.title: Deposit all 562?

item.title: Deposit all 562?
item.dc:creator: @kingjosty kingjosty
item.description:
@kingjosty wrote:

Hi,
I thought it may be possible to make a deposit all in a 562 by using a for loop to check the inventory, and deposit every item. But how on earth do I get the correct Item Id’s and Inventory slot Id’s ?

(pseudo code, how I think it should be done theoretically;And yes I know this code isn’t right in a million years, that’s why I’m asking for help.)

for(int i = 0; i < 28;i+=1)
{
BankItem(InvSlot[i].GetItemId);
}

A bit like that, only with different working codes XD

Read full topic
